thread.title: Caroline Flack, Ellie Goulding and Abbey Clancy propped up by pals after having one too many at Brits parties
thread.title_full: Caroline Flack, Ellie Goulding and Abbey Clancy propped up by pals after having one too many at Brits parties

author: Vicki Newman
title: Caroline Flack, Ellie Goulding and Abbey Clancy propped up by pals after having one too many at Brits parties
text:
Caroline Flack, Ellie Goulding and Abbey Clancy propped up by pals after having one too many at Brits parties Celebs let their hair down as they partied into the early hours Share These celebs partied pretty hard after the Brit Awards Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It's one of the biggest nights in showbusiness - and it's all about the after parties. 
The glitzy Brit Awards ceremony may be televised live from London's O2 Arena, but everyone knows the party doesn't really start until afterwards. 
When the awards draw to a close, celebs head out across to capital to hit the after parties. 
And it looks like a one or two people had a few too many as they celebrated into the early hours of the morning. Read More Need some help Ellie? (Photo: WENN.com) Maisie may have had one too many (Photo: Splash News) 
Ellie Goulding looked a little unsteady on her feet as she was propped up by pals at the Universal bash. 
The blonde beauty left the party with a friend on either side of her helping her along the way. 
A female friend wrapped her arm around Ellie's waist to guide her away from the party. 
Game of Thrones star Maisie Williams seems to have partied pretty hard too. 
The 19-year-old actress was spotted leaving the Warner Music after party and was snapped with her eyes closed as she walked alongside a pal. Caroline was escorted by a security guard (Photo: WeirPhotos / Splash News) She partied pretty hard (Photo: Splash News) 
Caroline Flack also had a little help when she wanted to leave the Warner Music party. 
The presenter looked a little bleary-eyed as she left the gathering with a leopard print coat draped across her shoulders. 
It seems she was helped to a taxi by a burly security guard who walked alongside her. Emma hit the parties after presenting the ceremony (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) View gallery Ashley made it to the taxi (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) 
Emma Willis , who shared presenting duties with Dermot O'Leary, seems to have let her hair down once work was over and done with. 
She was spotted at the Warner Bros party and looks to have had a very good time. 
Former Pussycat Doll Ashley Roberts looked a little bleary-eyed too. 
The blonde beauty almost flashed her knickers as she climbed into a taxi after the Warner Bros party, and it looks like she's going to fall asleep at any moment. Read More Mollie King had a good night (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) Katy let her hair down (Photo: Splash News) 
The Saturdays singer Mollie King clearly partied hard at the Universal after party, and was spotted looking a little worse for wear as she headed out into the night in a fluffy coat. 
Katy Perry had a big night at the Brits, taking to the stage to perform her new single Chained To The Rhythm. 
She too headed to the Universal Records bash after the ceremony and was spotted smiling from ear to ear as she left. 
Pixie Lott draped her legs over some friends as she got into a taxi. 
The singer was spotted leaving an after party at the Freemasons' Hall and clearly wanted to take the weight off her feet. 
Well, it can be tough walking around in heels all night. Put your feet up, Pixie (Photo: MAGICMOMENTSUK) Abbey, are you okay? (Photo: Rex Features) She's looking worse for wear (Photo: MAGICMOMENTSUK) 
Abbey Clancy partied pretty hard at the Warner Music bash. 
The model was looking a little dishevelled with her hair in her face as she headed home. 
It seems to have taken a team of people, including her husband Peter Crouch, to get her into a taxi. Watch your head (Photo: MAGICMOMENTSUK) She gets a little help (Photo: MAGICMOMENTSUK) It's a tricky maneuver (Photo: MAGICMOMENTSUK) 
Abbey seems to have hit her head on the taxi at one point, but she probably didn't feel it until the morning. 
The stunner was held up by friends as she carried out the tricky maneuvers of climbing in and out of a taxi. Read More Ed left a bash with his girlfriend Cherry Seaborn (Photo: Rex Features) Christine Bleakley sauntered off home after partying (Photo: WENN.com) 
Ed Sheeran was celebrating too. 
He hit the Warner Music after party with girlfriend Cherry Seaborn after taking to the stage to perform a mash up of his latest tracks. 
Christine Bleakley hit the town pretty hard as well by the looks of things. 
The presenter was spotted heading home after a night out on the tiles. Like us on Facebook
